Appendix:
Overview of the &homalg; Package Source Code
The &homalg; package reached more than 30.000 lines of &GAP4; code (excluding the documentation) before the first release was made. To keep this amount of code tracebale, the package was split in several files.

The homalgTable for &GAP4; built-in rings
For the purposes of &homalg;, the ring of integers is, at least up till now, the only ring which is properly supported in &GAP4;. The &GAP4; built-in cababilities for polynomial rings (also univariate) and group rings do not statisfy the minimum requirements of &homalg;. The &GAP4; package &Gauss; enables &GAP; to fullfil the &homalg; requirements for prime fields, and &ZZ; / p^n.
